summary:
I am a scientific editor specializing in the earth and environmental sciences at Cell Press's open access, interdisciplinary journal, iScience. 

As an environmental scientist with over seven years' experience in bioremediation, environmental policy, and higher education, I apply my interdisciplinary expertise at publishing innovative and impactful research. I'm most interested in the intersections of science and policyâ€”particularly for sustainability, circularity, environmental justice, and climate change mitigation/adaptation. 

Blij om Nederlands te oefenen met nieuwe collegas en vrienden!
